feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-20T05:55:30.889739Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;ChatGPT：恐惧连诵</stitle>; <id>;https://chat.openai.com/share/312e82f0-cc5e-47f3-b368-b2c0c0f4ad3f</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-20T05:23:54.045871Z</updated>; <link href="https://chat.openai.com/share/312e82f0-cc5e-47f3-b368-b2c0c0f4ad3f"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Cloudef </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Cloudef</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat .io/#chatgpt-fear-litany" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36400053" target="_blank">; [评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PostgreSQL 重新考虑其流程-基于模型</stitle>; <id>;https://lwn.net/SubscriberLink/934940/3abb2d4086680b78/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T16:53:54.048408Z</updated>; <link href="https ://lwn.net/SubscriberLink/934940/3abb2d4086680b78/"/>; <author>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;PostgreSQL 数据库系统正在考虑进行根本性的改变，以摆脱其面向过程的模型。当前的模型作为大量协作进程运行，多年来一直很好地为该项目服务，但也面临着局限性。转向线程模型被视为提高可扩展性和降低开发成本的潜在解决方案。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#postgresql-reconsiders-its-process-based-model" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36393030" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;液晶电视不会有任何进一步发展</stitle>; <id>;https://www.tomsguide.com/news/its-official-lcd-tvs-wont -see-any-further-development</id>; <updated>;2023-06-20T01:53:54.052092Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.tomsguide.com/news/its-official- lcd-tvs-wont-see-any-further-development"/>; <author>; <name>;belltaco</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=belltaco</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/qJJHUiSKe2nBw8rbtLzhZi-320-80.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;业内人士表示，LCD研发的日子已经过去了。所有新的研发资金都用于 MicroLED 和 OLED 等自发光显示器，以及 Mini-LED 等背光技术。液晶电视不会有任何进一步的发展。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lcd-tvs-wont-see-any-further-development" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36398596" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Matasano 加密挑战（2014 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://cryptopals.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-20T00： 53:54.052702Z</updated>; <link href="https://cryptopals.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;simonpure</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user? id=simonpure</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Matasano 加密挑战提供了一种不同的方式来学习密码学，方法是解决由现实世界系统中的弱点引起的问题。参与者可以了解基本的加密概念以及它们是如何受到攻击的。挑战越来越难，并且基于现实世界的漏洞。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-matasano-crypto-challenges-2014" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36398292" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;赏云会</stitle>; <id>;https://cloudappreciationsociety.org/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-20T00:53:54.053259Z</updated>; <link href="https://cloudappreciationsociety.org/"/>; <author>; <name>;surprisetalk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=surprisetalk</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cloudappreciationsociety.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/09/CloudApprecaitionDay-SquareAnimation-1300-700x700.gif" style="width: 220px ; 高度：220px;" />;<br />;必要的cookies对于网站的基本功能和安全特性是必不可少的。功能性 cookie 启用某些功能，例如共享内容和收集反馈。性能 cookie 分析网站性能以获得更好的用户体验。分析性 cookie 跟踪访客互动。广告 cookie 提供相关广告。正在分析其他未分类的 cookie。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cloud-appreciation-society" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36398081" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;关于 AVX-512 最不有趣的部分是 512 位向量宽度</stitle>; <id>;https://mastodon.gamedev.place/@rygorous/110572829749524388</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-19T21:53:54.053804Z</updated>; <link href="https://mastodon.gamedev.place/@rygorous/110572829749524388"/>; <author>; <name>;luu</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=luu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;根据要求，我通常“关于 AVX-512 最不感兴趣的部分是 512 位矢量宽度" 线程形式的信息转储。所以这里是 AVX-512 引入的清单，我认为这些清单对于典型用例比 512 位向量更重要：<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the -least-interesting-part-about-avx-512-is-the-512-bits-vector-width" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=36396891" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;白天午睡对大脑有益</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bbc.com/news/health-65950168</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -20T03:53:54.054324Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.bbc.com/news/health-65950168"/>; <author>; <name>;andsoitis</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=andsoitis</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/976/ cpsprodpb/002C/production/_130144000_gettyimages-1073872862.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;那些喜欢午睡的人的大脑看起来比其他人年轻六岁。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-daytime-nap-is-good-for-the-brain" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36399503" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Bit Hacking（使用 Go 代码）</stitle>; <id>;https://lemire.me/blog/2023/02/07/bit-hacking -with-go-code/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-20T01:53:54.054820Z</更新>; <link href="https://lemire.me/blog/2023/02/07/bit -hacking-with-go-code/"/>; <author>; <name>;gus_leonel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gus_leonel</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;<img src="https://lemire.me/img/portrait2018facebook.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;从根本上讲，程序员需要操作位。现代处理器通过加载“寄存器”而不是单个位来操作数据。因此，程序员必须知道如何操作寄存器中的位。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bit-hacking-with-go-code" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36388892" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;Shell 中的文件名和路径名：如何正确执行（2020）</stitle>; <id>;https://dwheeler.com/essays/filenames-in-shell.html< /id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T23:53:54.056896Z</更新>; <link href="https://dwheeler.com/essays/filenames-in-shell.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;许多 Bourne shell 脚本不处理文件名和路径名在 Unix-like/POSIX 系统上正确运行，导致错误的脚本和潜在的安全漏洞。这篇文章总结了如何在 shell 脚本中正确处理文件名，并强调了处理文件名的常见错误方法。它还讨论了类 Unix 系统中文件名的过度宽容，并提出了更改建议，以便更容易编写用于处理文件名的安全代码。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#filenames-and-pathnames-in-shell-how-to-do-it-correctly-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36388825" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MVC 不是 MVC</stitle>; <id>;https://collindonnell.com/mvc-isnt-mvc</ id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T22:53:54.057379Z</更新>; <link href="https://collindonnell.com/mvc-isnt-mvc"/>; <作者>; <name>;ingve</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.snap.as/ onaddV2k.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：312px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了模型-视图-控制器 (MVC) 设计模式的演变。它探讨了 MVC 的不同变体，包括原始概念、Apple 风格的 MVC 和用于 Web 开发的 Model-2 风格。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mvc-isnt-mvc" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36397058" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;Haskell 中的动态编程：自动记忆</stitle>; <id>;https://byorgey.wordpress.com/2023/06/06/dynamic-programming-in-haskell-automatic-memoization/< /id>; <更新>;2023-06-20T01:53:54.058302Z</更新>; <link href="https://byorgey.wordpress.com/2023/06/06/dynamic-programming-in-haskell-automatic -memoization/"/>; <author>; <name>;g0xA52A2A</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=g0xA52A2A</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://s0.wp.com/i/blank.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;这是承诺的关于 Haskell 动态规划的多部分系列的第 2 部分。在这个问题中，我们得到了一系列带有问号的左括号和右括号（圆括号、方括号和大括号），并且必须计算可以用括号替换问号以创建有效的不同方式的数量, 正确嵌套的括号序列。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dynamic-programming-in-haskell-automatic-memoization" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36380291" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Google 警告自己的员工：不要使用 Bard 生成的代码</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/19/even_google_warns_its_own /</id>; <updated>;2023-06-20T02:53:54.058745Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2023/06/19/even_google_warns_its_own/"/>; <author >; <name>;Brajeshwar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //regmedia.co.uk/2023/04/17/shutterstock_blank_roadsign_ai_risk_ahead.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;谷歌已警告其员工不要泄露机密信息或使用其人工智能聊天机器人 Bard 生成的代码。谷歌的内部警告引发了人们对私人公司构建的人工智能工具不可信的担忧。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#google-warns-its-own-employees-do-not-use-code-generated-by-bard" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36399021" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Ken Thompson 关于暴露他的编译器木马 (2021) 的错误</stitle>; <id>;https://www .tuhs.org/pipermail/tuhs/2021-September/024486.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T17:53:54.059634Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.tuhs. org/pipermail/tuhs/2021-September/024486.html"/>; <author>; <name>;throwawaylinux</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=throwawaylinux</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;Ken Thompson kenbob at gmail.com 2021 年 9 月 20 日星期一 23:51:40 AEST 2021 有关 TUHS 邮件列表的更多信息 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #ken-thompson-on-the-bug-that-exposed-his-compiler-trojan-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=36389660" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Theseus DHT 协议（2018）</stitle>; <id>;https://wootfish.github.io/theseus.dht/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T17:53： 54.060133Z</updated>; <link href="https://wootfish.github.io/theseus.dht/"/>; <author>; <name>;killittosaveit</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=killittosaveit</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Theseus DHT 协议允许创建具有强大安全属性的分布式哈希表 (DHT)。它提供了针对 Sybil 攻击的稳健性、强大的加密和对中间人攻击的抵抗力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#theseus-dht-protocol-2018" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36394247" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;联邦应用程序问题</stitle>; <id>;https://plug-world.com/posts/the-federated-app-problem/</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -19T23:53:54.060584Z</updated>; <link href="https://plug-world.com/posts/the-federated-app-problem/"/>; <author>; <name>;plug_world</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=plug_world</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;联合应用程序面临着几个问题，包括缺乏用户直观性、流行的服务器过载实例和实例锁定。这些问题阻碍了大规模采用并破坏了联邦的目的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-federated-app-problem" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36397740" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;BetaWiki – 软件历史的开放百科全书</stitle>; <id>;https://betawiki.net/wiki/Main_Page</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T20:53: 54.061456Z</updated>; <link href="https://betawiki.net/wiki/Main_Page"/>; <author>; <name>;skilled</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=skilled</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://betawiki.net/images/thumb/9/92/LH4066_Desktop.png/200px-LH4066_Desktop.png " style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;Windows Server 2003 build 2462 的 IA-64 编译包括 Windows 2000 个人版的登录横幅。Windows Server 2008 build 4066 是 Windows Server 2008 的预重置版本，最初由 Grabberslasher 描述2008 年 5 月 1 日在他的 UX.Unleaked 博客中，并于年底上传到那里。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#betawiki-an-open-encyclopedia-of-software-history" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36369060" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat。 io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Hurl，一个可怕（但可爱）的语言想法</stitle>; <id>;https://ntietz.com/blog/introducing-hurl/</ id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T17:53:54.061988Z</updated>; <link href="https://ntietz.com/blog/introducing-hurl/"/>; <author>; <name>;todsacerdoti</ 更新name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;几个月前，在和朋友聊天时，我们四处闲逛有了一种语言的想法，您获得的唯一控制流就是错误处理。不幸的是，我决定让这种语言成为现实。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hurl-a-terrible-but-cute-idea-for-a-language" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36393673" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Gopher Wrangling：Go 中的有效错误处理</stitle>; <id>;https://stephenn.com/2023/06/gopher-wrangling。 -effective-error-handling-in-go/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T22:53:54.062430Z</更新>; <link href="https://stephenn.com/2023/06/gopher -wrangling.-effective-error-handling-in-go/"/>; <author>; <name>;stephen123</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=stephen123</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://stephenn.com/assets/2023-06-gopher-wrangling-go-errors.png" style="宽度：220px；高度： 220 像素；" />;<br />;用 Go 编程时，错误处理可能会让人不知所措。然而，通过一些技巧和指导原则，可以轻松处理错误，保持代码整洁并确保对生产的信心。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gopher-wrangling-effective-error-handling-in-go" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36397380" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat。 io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：基于 Debian 的家庭路由器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/tonusoo/koduinternet-cpe</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-19T21:53:54.062884Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/tonusoo/koduinternet-cpe"/>; <author>; <name>;tonusoo</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tonusoo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tonusoo/koduinternet-cpe /main/imgs/router_with_side_panel_removed.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;本文讨论如何使用传统 PC 硬件和 SFP GPON ONT 设置基于 Debian 的路由器。包括网卡NVRAM配置、网卡驱动修改、SFP ONT root、修改SFP ONT串口等步骤。文章还提供了华为MA5671A SFP ONT和戴尔N20KJ网卡的信息，以及2500BASE-X模式。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-debian-based-home-router" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36396523" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：我的 Hacker News 推荐引擎</stitle>; <id>;https://hn-recommend.julienc.me</id>; <updated>;2023-06 -19T14:53:54.063322Z</updated>; <link href="https://hn-recommend.julienc.me"/>; <author>; <name>;julien040</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=julien040</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://hn-recommend.julienc.me/og-image.png" 风格= “宽度：220px；高度：116px；” />;<br />;HN 推荐为您提供与 URL 或文本相关的最流行的 Hacker News 帖子。它使用机器学习模型来查找最相似的帖子。它是开源的，可以免费使用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-my-recommendation-engine-for-hacker-news" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36391655" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;苹果联合创始人出售卡梅尔谷牧场，将成为自然保护区</stitle>; <id>;https://www.mercurynews.com/2023/06 /18/apple-co-founder-to-sell-huge-carmel-valley-ranch-for-35m-to-become-public-nature-preserve/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T21： 53:54.063749Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.mercurynews.com/2023/06/18/apple-co-founder-to-sell-huge-carmel-valley-ranch-for-35 -million-to-become-public-nature-preserve/"/>; <author>; <name>;toomuchtodo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=toomuchtodo</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/www.mercurynews.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/SJM-L-Rana-Creek- 6425_107840379.jpg?fit=620%2C9999px&ssl=1" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;一位硅谷科技领袖正在将他在卡梅尔谷的广阔牧场出售给一个保护组织，以成为一个公共保护区和文化遗址。该物业被称为 Rana Creek 牧场，价值 14,100-英亩的景观将向公众开放，供徒步旅行、骑山地自行车和骑马。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#apple-co-founder-sells-carmel-valley-ranch-will -become-nature-preserve" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36396675" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;氮化铁：无需稀有元素的强力磁铁地球元素</stitle>; <id>;https://hackaday.com/2022/09/01/iron-nitrides-powerful-magnets-without-the-rare-earth-elements/</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-20T03:53:54.064265Z</updated>; <link href="https://hackaday.com/2022/09/01/iron-nitrides-powerful-magnets-without-the-rare-earth-elements/" />; <author>; <name>;milar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=milar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img 源="https://hackaday.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/08/Magnetic_02.jpg?w=800" style="宽度：220px； height: 134px;" />;<br />;稀土磁铁已经彻底改变了技术，但它们的生产依赖于稀有且地缘政治敏感的稀土元素。然而，可能很快就可以制造出不含稀土金属的强力磁铁。通过结合铁和氮，以及对晶体结构的理解，研究人员开发出具有与稀土磁铁相当的特性的氮化铁。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#iron-nitrides-powerful-magnets -without-the-rare-earth-elements" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36399388" target="_blank" >;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何提升一家消耗大量能源的工厂？</stitle>; <id>;https://electronics.stackexchange.com/questions/670763/how-to-ramp-up-a-factory-consuming-a-lot-of-energy </id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T16:53:54.064702Z</更新>; <link href="https://electronics.stackexchange.com/questions/670763/how-to-ramp-up-a- factory-consuming-a-lot-of-energy"/>; <author>; <name>;joebiden2</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=joebiden2</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.sstatic.net/Img/teams/teams-illo-free-sidebar-promo.svg?v=47faa659a05e" style="width: 220px ; height: 181px;" />;<br />;在如此高的功率水平下，消费者在电网稳定中起着积极的作用。电网运营商可以远程控制消费者的电力供应以确保电网稳定。工厂必须有现场存储或其他缓解功率波动的方法。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-ramp-up-a-factory-consuming-a-lot-of-energy" target="_blank" >;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36392510" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;AI：60 年来第一个新的 UI 范式？</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /www.nngroup.com/articles/ai-paradigm/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-19T18:53:54.065137Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.nngroup.com/articles /ai-paradigm/"/>; <author>; <name>;ssn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ssn</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://media.nngroup.com/media/editor/2023/06/16/ai-paradigms-24.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 115px;" />;<br />;ChatGPT 和其他人工智能系统正在引入计算史上的第三种用户界面范式，这是 60 多年来的第一个新交互模型。第一个 UI 范式是批处理，用户提交了一个完整的工作流程，稍后收到了输出。第二种 UI 范式是基于命令的交互，用户和计算机一次轮流使用一个命令。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ai- first-new-ui-paradigm-in-60-years" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36394569" target= "_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;缩放Facebook 上的 Memcache（2021 年）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.micahlerner.com/2021/05/31/scaling-memcache-at-facebook.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-19T23 :53:54.065588Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.micahlerner.com/2021/05/31/scaling-memcache-at-facebook.html"/>; <author>; <name>;greghn< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=greghn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.micahlerner. com/assets/fbmc/memcache.png" style="width: 220px; height: 157px;" />;<br />;Facebook 在 memcached 之上构建了分布式键值存储来缓存各种数据。他们通过减少延迟在集群内、区域内以及多个区域之间扩展系统，实施拥塞控制措施，并在池中添加租约和复制。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#scaling-memcache-at-facebook-2021" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36397485" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;阻止 DNS 到 127.0.0.1 的文档推理</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/easylist/ easylist/issues/16372</id>; <updated>;2023-06-20T03:53:54.066022Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/16372"/>; <作者>; <name>;waplot</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=waplot</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https //opengraph.githubassets.com/69b18c8931295d65628588ada05eb25c36c659ea6168da666c558e5f63f11bc6/easylist/easylist/issues/16372" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;文章提供了一个应该阻止DNS解析到IP地址127.0.0.1的域名列表。这可以通过为这些域添加特定的DNS阻止规则来实现。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#document-reasoning-to-block-dns-to-127-0-0-1" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36399208" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
